en.emergency_fund_suggestion: You need to save at least 3-6 months of living expenses.
en.home_purchase_suggestion: You should aim to save for a down payment (typically 20% of the home value).
en.retirement_suggestion: Consider saving 15% of your income towards retirement.
en.debt_repayment_suggestion: Focus on paying off high-interest debt first.
en.goal_suggestions_intro: Based on your goal and current balance, here are some suggestions:
en.emergency_fund_tip: üåü Try to save GHS 500 more this month to reach your goal faster.
en.home_purchase_tip: üíº Invest in a high-yield savings account or consider low-risk investments.
en.navigation_instructions: Use the buttons below to navigate through the app:
